dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener, Arman from Almaty, just wrote in asking if he can use his Kaspi.kz app on his upcoming trip to Seoul.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener, Arman from Almaty, just wrote in asking if he can use his the website app on his upcoming trip to Seoul.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joint Stock Company Kaspi.kz (Kaspi.kz) (Nasdaq: KSPI), which operates the Kaspi.kz Super App for consumers and Kaspi Pay Super App for merchants, today announces a new partnership with Alipay + to enable Kaspi.kz customers to pay using the Kaspi.kz Super App and QR code, throughout China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, perfect timing. Yeah, so this new partnership with WeChat Pay is a huge deal for that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, perfect timing. Yeah, so this new partnership with WeChat Pay is a huge deal for that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joint Stock Company Kaspi.kz (Kaspi.kz) (Nasdaq: KSPI), which operates the Kaspi.kz Super App for consumers and Kaspi Pay Super App for merchants, today announces a new partnership with Alipay + to enable Kaspi.kz customers to pay using the Kaspi.kz Super App and QR code, throughout China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. So now, Kazakhstanis are traveling to South Korea, they don't necessarily need to carry a physical card anymore.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. So now, Kazakhstanis are traveling to South Korea, they don't necessarily need to carry a physical card anymore.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When travelling in China, Kazakhstanis no longer need to take cash or a card with them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because the app uses NFC technology at over 4 million points of sale there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because the app uses N F C technology at over four million points of sale there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now, using the Kaspi.kz Super App, purchases in Chinese stores, cafes, taxis and more than 80 million points throughout China can be paid for by QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is just... everywhere. Stores, cafes, even taxis.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is just... everywhere. Stores, cafes, even taxis.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now, using the Kaspi.kz Super App, purchases in Chinese stores, cafes, taxis and more than 80 million points throughout China can be paid for by QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the CEO, uh, Venetia Lee, mentioned they got a lot of feedback from customers wanting to pay abroad as easily as they do at home.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the C E O, uh, Venetia Lee, mentioned they got a lot of feedback from customers wanting to pay abroad as easily as they do at home.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: CEO and Co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail Lomtadze, commented: Many Kazakhstanis work, study and vacation in China. We constantly receive feedback from our customers - how nice it would be to pay for purchases abroad as easily as in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a game-changer for sure. You just open the Kaspi.kz Super App, select the service, and either scan or get scanned.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a game-changer for sure. You just open the the website Super App, select the service, and either scan or get scanned.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To pay for purchases, Kaspi.kz customers just need to open the Kaspi.kz app, select the AliPay+ service and let the seller scan their QR code or alternatively buyers can scan the seller's QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The partnership is actually with WeChat Pay, but the payment method itself goes through the Alipay+ service within the app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The partnership is actually with WeChat Pay, but the payment method itself goes through the Alipay+ service within the app.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joint Stock Company Kaspi.kz (Kaspi.kz) (Nasdaq: KSPI), which operates the Kaspi.kz Super App for consumers and Kaspi Pay Super App for merchants, today announces a new partnership with Alipay + to enable Kaspi.kz customers to pay using the Kaspi.kz Super App and QR code, throughout China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that part is a little confusing, but the key takeaway is seamless payment in South Korea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that part is a little confusing, but the key takeaway is seamless payment in South Korea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now with the Kaspi.kz Super App our customers can pay for almost any goods at retail outlets throughout China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mikhail Lomtadze from Alipay International called it a way to bring people and communities closer through commerce.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mikhail Lomtadze from Alipay International called it a way to bring people and communities closer through commerce.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Venetia Lee, Greater China General Manager of Ant International, commented: Alipay+ is thrilled to announce our partnership with the first and leading e-wallet Super App in Kazakhstan. She added that, While this partnership will enhance the travel and shopping experience for Kaspi.kz users, we will continue to build on our innovative technology and service excellence to bring people and communities closer through travel, trade and commerce.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which sounds like corporate speak, but honestly, for a user, it just means one less thing to worry about when traveling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which sounds like corporate speak, but honestly, for a user, it just means one less thing to worry about when traveling.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. No more worrying about currency exchange or card fees at the point of sale.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. No more worrying about currency exchange or card fees at the point of sale.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a smart move for Kaspi.kz, expanding their Super App's utility beyond Kazakhstan's borders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a smart move for the website, expanding their Super App's utility beyond Kazakhstan's borders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And it aligns with their mission to improve people's lives through innovative mobile products.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And it aligns with their mission to improve people's lives through innovative mobile products.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs mission is to improve peoples lives by developing innovative mobile products and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely feels like the future of travel payments is heading this way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely feels like the future of travel payments is heading this way.

artist_script:
HostA: A listener, Arman from Almaty, just wrote in asking if he can use his Kaspi.kz app on his upcoming trip to Seoul.
HostB: Oh, perfect timing. Yeah, so this new partnership with WeChat Pay is a huge deal for that.
HostA: Exactly. So now, Kazakhstanis are traveling to South Korea, they don't necessarily need to carry a physical card anymore.
HostB: Right, because the app uses NFC technology at over 4 million points of sale there.
HostA: Which is just... everywhere. Stores, cafes, even taxis.
HostB: And the CEO, uh, Venetia Lee, mentioned they got a lot of feedback from customers wanting to pay abroad as easily as they do at home.
HostA: It's a game-changer for sure. You just open the Kaspi.kz Super App, select the service, and either scan or get scanned.
HostB: The partnership is actually with WeChat Pay, but the payment method itself goes through the Alipay+ service within the app.
HostA: Yeah, that part is a little confusing, but the key takeaway is seamless payment in South Korea.
HostB: Mikhail Lomtadze from Alipay International called it a way to bring people and communities closer through commerce.
HostA: Which sounds like corporate speak, but honestly, for a user, it just means one less thing to worry about when traveling.
HostB: Absolutely. No more worrying about currency exchange or card fees at the point of sale.
HostA: It's a smart move for Kaspi.kz, expanding their Super App's utility beyond Kazakhstan's borders.
HostB: For sure. And it aligns with their mission to improve people's lives through innovative mobile products.
HostA: Definitely feels like the future of travel payments is heading this way.
